alert.note: Alert for Pepin; Pierce (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 9:00AM CST until December 15 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Light mixed precipitation this evening will give way to snow overnight, which will continue into Thursday, with accumulations of more than 6 inches expected. * WHERE...Pierce and Pepin Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
